text: Ulia uli nende obumanyi bweshitabu naboola mbu; “Esie nditsa okhukhurerera noshili okhumetiametia (Okhutimba) tsimoni tsitsio, “kho olwa yalola nishirererwe imbeli wuwe naboola mbu; “kano nikhutsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wanje khoyandeme mbu ekhupa orio nohomba ekhaya, ne ulia okhupa orio toto ye akhupa khululwe omwene, ne ulia ukhaya toto Nyasaye wanje ni Omuyinda Omuhani muno
